SEARCH
Module edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager
Package edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager.mappers

Class RelatedProductMapper

java.lang.Object
edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager.mappers.RelatedProductMapper
public class RelatedProductMapper extends Object
Mapper class responsible for transforming between RelatedProduct entities and RelatedProductDto objects.

This class provides utility methods for converting single `RelatedProduct` entities or lists of entities to their corresponding DTO representations.

  • Constructor Details

    • RelatedProductMapper

      public RelatedProductMapper()

  • Method Details

    • toDto

      public RelatedProductDto toDto(RelatedProduct relatedProduct)
      Converts a single RelatedProduct entity to a RelatedProductDto.

      If the entity is null, this method returns null. It maps the names of the related products to the DTO if the products themselves are not null.

      Parameters:
      relatedProduct - the RelatedProduct entity to convert.
      Returns:
      a RelatedProductDto representing the entity, or null if the input is null.

    • toDto

      public List<RelatedProductDto> toDto(List<RelatedProduct> relatedProducts)
      Converts a list of RelatedProduct entities to a list of RelatedProductDto objects.

      If the list is null, this method returns null. Each entity in the list is converted using the toDto(RelatedProduct) method.

      Parameters:
      relatedProducts - the list of RelatedProduct entities to convert.
      Returns:
      a list of RelatedProductDto objects, or null if the input list is null.
